pkgmetadata.longdescription: Probabilistic Phylogenetic Principal Component Analysis // Estimates probabilistic phylogenetic Principal Component Analysis (PCA) and non-phylogenetic probabilistic PCA. Provides methods to implement alternative models of trait evolution including Brownian motion (BM), Ornstein-Uhlenbeck (OU), Early Burst (EB), and Pagel's lambda. Also provides flexible biplot functions.
